type.description:
### ⚠️ Requires [Apugli](https://apugli.readthedocs.io/en/latest/) to be installed! ⚠️

## Compare Resource

---



[Entity Condition Type](https://apugli.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/entity_condition_types/compare_resource).

Compares the value of two powers that use the [Resource (Power Type)](https://apugli.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/entity_condition_types/compare_resource) or a power type that has a built-in cooldown (using remaining ticks as the value).

Type ID: `apugli:compare_resource`



---

### 📝 Note

This condition requires the entity it's checking to have both powers. It will return false if this isn't met.





---

comparison.description: How the `resource` power's value which are the specified should be compared to the `compare_to` power's value.
